Uses of Package
peregrine.io.chunk

Packages that use peregrine.io.chunk
peregrine.combine Combiner support or dealing with streaming key/value pairs and combining them before sending them out over the wire. 
peregrine.io Main IO package including high level IO references. 
peregrine.io.chunk Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files). 
peregrine.io.driver.shuffle Shuffle IO driver. 
peregrine.io.partition Code for writing partition files which are automatically written to the correct hosts and split into chunks. 
peregrine.reduce Handles sorting, merging, and reducing shuffle data. 
peregrine.reduce.merger Merge engine for the reducer. 
peregrine.reduce.sorter Sort engine for the reducer. 
peregrine.shuffle Generic shuffle data parsing functionality. 
peregrine.shuffle.sender Sends shuffle output from mappers. 
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.combine
ChunkReader
          Interface for reading data from a chunk in key/value form.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.io
ChunkReference
          Read data from a partition from local storage.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.io.chunk
ChunkReader
          Interface for reading data from a chunk in key/value form.
ChunkWriter
          Write key/values to chunks.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.io.driver.shuffle
ChunkReference
          Read data from a partition from local storage.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.io.partition
ChunkWriter
          Write key/values to chunks.
DefaultChunkReader
          Default ChunkReader implementation which uses mmap, and supports features like CRC32, etc.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.reduce

          Write key/values to chunks.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.reduce.merger

          Write key/values to chunks.
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk used by peregrine.reduce.sorter
ChunkReader
          Interface for reading data from a chunk in key/value form.
CompositeChunkReader
          An interface to work with mulitple ShuffleInputChunkReaders when doing chunk sorting.
DefaultChunkReader
          Default ChunkReader implementation which uses mmap, and supports features like CRC32, etc.
DefaultChunkWriter
           Write key/value pairs to a given file on disk and include any additional metadata (size, etc).
